problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,AB=10,AC=6,过点A的直线DE∥CB,∠ABC与∠ACB的平分线分别交DE于E,D,则DE的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = N_0, AC = N_1, the straight line DE ∥ CB passing through point A, the bisectors of ∠ABC and ∠ACB intersect DE at E, D respectively, then the length of DE is ()
raw_comment: 本题综合考查了勾股定理、平行线的性质以及等腰三角形的判定与性质．注意,勾股定理应用的前提条件是在直角三角形中
